Interface PermissionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionManagerImpl

    public interface PermissionManager

    • Method Detail

      • getAreaControlPermissionForRole

        AreaControlPermission getAreaControlPermissionForRole(String role,
                                                    String typeId)
        Get the area control permission for a given role. This provides the permissions that the role currently has.

      • getDefaultAreaControlPermissionForRole

        AreaControlPermission getDefaultAreaControlPermissionForRole(String role,
                                                           String typeId)
        Get the default area control permission for a given role. This provides the permissions that the role currently has.

      • createAreaControlPermissionForRole

        AreaControlPermission createAreaControlPermissionForRole(String role,
                                                       String typeId)
        Create an empty area control permission with system properties populated (ie: uuid).

      • saveAreaControlPermissionForRole

        void saveAreaControlPermissionForRole(Area area,
                                    AreaControlPermission permission,
                                    String typeId)
        Save an area control permission. This is backed in the database by a single Control permission (used for areas, forums, and topics).

      • saveDefaultAreaControlPermissionForRole

        void saveDefaultAreaControlPermissionForRole(Area area,
                                           AreaControlPermission permission,
                                           String typeId)
        Save a default area control permission. This is backed in the database by a single Control permission (used for areas, forums, and topics).

      • getForumControlPermissionForRole

        ForumControlPermission getForumControlPermissionForRole(BaseForum forum,
